summary: Mercedes (Marga Lopez) dances for money with the clients of Salon Mexico, a famous cabaret in Mexico City. Her younger sister Beatriz (Derbez) studies in an expensive private school, paid ... See full summary »
cast: Marga López|Miguel Inclán|Rodolfo Acosta|Roberto Cañedo|Mimí Derba|Carlos Múzquiz|Fanny Schiller|Estela Matute|Silvia Derbez|Luis Aceves Castañeda|Stephen Berne|Irma Dorantes|Magdalena Estrada|Rogelio Fernández|Maruja Grifell|Ana María Hernández|Regino Herrera|Héctor Mateos|Francisco Reiguera|Enriqueta Reza|Humberto Rodríguez|Zoila Esperanza Rojas|José Torvay|Hernán Vera|Ignacio Villalbazo|Ana María Villaseñor
title: Salón México
